                           Release Notes
-----------------------------------------------------------------

Comments :
A young girl inhabits an isolated island with her scientist father and 
communicates with a reclusive author of the novel she&#039;s reading. It is 
an existence that mirrors that of her favorite literary character, Alex 
Rover, the world&#039;s greatest adventurer. But Alexandra, the author of the 
Rover books, leads a reclusive life in the big city. When Nim&#039;s father 
goes missing from their island, a twist of fate brings her together with 
Alexandra. Now they must draw courage from their fictional hero, Alex 
Rover, and find strength in one another to conquer Nim&#039;s Island.

Director : Jennifer Flackett
           Mark Levin  

Writers: Joseph Kwong
         Paula Mazur

            
Cast:
